label: melting point of naphthalene under standard conditions
definition: thermodynamic temperature for the melting point (at the solid to liquid phase transition) of a known purity (99.12 (w/w) sample of naphthalene at atmospheric pressure
comment: thermodynamic temperature; at the solid to liquid phase transition; purity (99.12 (w/w); naphthalene; at atmospheric pressure

hasConstraint.label: at the solid to liquid phase transition
